page.title: 03A Day In The Life Of Giles
page.content: I get up at 7.45.I get out of bed and put on my school clothes.They are:a shirt,a red tie,a grey jumper,grey socks,pants and a pair of grey trousers.Then I go and get washed.After that I go downstairs and eat my breakfast.I usually have FROSTIES.These are yellow bits of corn and you pour milk on them.Milk is a white liquid and it comes from cows.Then I go outside to feed the hens.I give them two cupfulls of barley.After that I go inside and do my music practice.I play the piano and the clarinet.Then I put on my coat and sling on my satchel and go out and get into the car.My mum drives the car.My dad goes to his work in our other car.My sister and my brother go to another school. When we get to school mu m parks by the farm and
